019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
024import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity.Format;
025import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.EventsV1Event;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.Config;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.math.BigDecimal;
033import java.nio.file.Files;
034import java.nio.file.Path;
035import java.time.Instant;
036import java.util.Map;
037import java.util.Optional;
038import java.util.Set;
039import java.util.logging.Level;
040import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
041import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
042import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM;
043import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8s;
044import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicModel;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicStub;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.BalloonChangeEvent;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.Exit;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.HotpluggableCpuStatus;
049import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerConfigurationUpdate;
050import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange;
051import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
052import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ShutdownEvent;
053import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
054import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
055import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
056import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
057import org.jgrapes.core.events.HandlingError;
058import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
059import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
060import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration;
061
062/**
063 * Updates the CR status.
064 */
065@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
066public class StatusUpdater extends Component {
067
068    private static final Set<State> RUNNING_STATES
069        = Set.of(State.RUNNING, State.TERMINATING);
070
071    private String namespace;
072    private String vmName;
073    private ApiClient apiClient;
074    private long observedGeneration;
075    private boolean guestShutdownStops;
076    private boolean shutdownByGuest;
077    private K8sDynamicStub vmStub;
078
079    /**
080     * Instantiates a new status updater.
081     *
082     * @param componentChannel the component channel
083     */
084    public StatusUpdater(Channel componentChannel) {
085        super(componentChannel);
086        try {
087            apiClient = Config.defaultClient();
088            io.kubernetes.client.openapi.Configuration
089                .setDefaultApiClient(apiClient);
090        } catch (IOException e) {
091            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
092                () -> "Cannot access events API, terminating.");
093            fire(new Exit(1));
094        }
095
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * On handling error.
100     *
101     * @param event the event
102     */
103    @Handler(channels = Channel.class)
104    public void onHandlingError(HandlingError event) {
105        if (event.throwable() instanceof ApiException exc) {
106            logger.log(Level.WARNING, exc,
107                () -> "Problem accessing kubernetes: " + exc.getResponseBody());
108            event.stop();
109        }
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * On configuration update.
114     *
115     * @param event the event
116     */
117    @Handler
118    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
119    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
120        event.structured("/Runner").ifPresent(c -> {
121            if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
122                namespace = (String) c.get("namespace");
123                updateNamespace();
124                vmName = Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, String>) c.get("vm"))
125                    .map(vm -> vm.get("name")).orElse(null);
126            }
127        });
128    }
129
130    private void updateNamespace() {
131        if (namespace == null) {
132            var path = Path
133                .of("/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace");
134            if (Files.isReadable(path)) {
135                try {
136                    namespace = Files.lines(path).findFirst().orElse(null);
137                } catch (IOException e) {
138                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
139                        () -> "Cannot read namespace.");
140                }
141            }
142        }
143        if (namespace == null) {
144            logger.warning(() -> "Namespace is unknown, some functions"
145                + " won't be available.");
146        }
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Handle the start event.
151     *
152     * @param event the event
153     * @throws IOException 
154     * @throws ApiException 
155     */
156    @Handler
157    public void onStart(Start event) {
158        if (namespace == null) {
159            return;
160        }
161        try {
162            vmStub = K8sDynamicStub.get(apiClient,
163                new GroupVersionKind(VM_OP_GROUP, "", VM_OP_KIND_VM),
164                namespace, vmName).orElse(null);
165            if (vmStub != null) {
166                observedGeneration
167                    = vmStub.state().getMetadata().getGeneration();
168            }
169        } catch (ApiException e) {
170            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
171                () -> "Cannot access VM object, terminating.");
172            event.cancel(true);
173            fire(new Exit(1));
174        }
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * On runner configuration update.
179     *
180     * @param event the event
181     * @throws ApiException 
182     */
183    @Handler
184    public void onRunnerConfigurationUpdate(RunnerConfigurationUpdate event)
185            throws ApiException {
186        guestShutdownStops = event.configuration().guestShutdownStops;
187
188        // Remainder applies only if we have a connection to k8s.
189        if (vmStub == null) {
190            return;
191        }
192        // A change of the runner configuration is typically caused
193        // by a new version of the CR. So we observe the new CR.
194        var vmObj = vmStub.state();
195        if (vmObj.metadata().getGeneration() == observedGeneration) {
196            return;
197        }
198        vmStub.updateStatus(vmObj, from -> {
199            JsonObject status = K8s.status(from);
200            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
201                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond).filter(cond -> "Running"
202                    .equals(cond.get("type").getAsString()))
203                .forEach(cond -> cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
204                    from.getMetadata().getGeneration()));
205            return status;
206        });
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * On runner state changed.
211     *
212     * @param event the event
213     * @throws ApiException 
214     */
215    @Handler
216    public void onRunnerStateChanged(RunnerStateChange event)
217            throws ApiException {
218        if (vmStub == null) {
219            return;
220        }
221        var vmState = vmStub.state();
222        vmStub.updateStatus(vmState, from -> {
223            JsonObject status = K8s.status(from);
224            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
225                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
226                .forEach(cond -> {
227                    if ("Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString())) {
228                        updateRunningCondition(event, from, cond);
229                    }
230                });
231            if (event.state() == State.STARTING) {
232                status.addProperty("ram", GsonPtr.to(from.data())
233                    .getAsString("spec", "vm", "maximumRam").orElse("0"));
234                status.addProperty("cpus", 1);
235            } else if (event.state() == State.STOPPED) {
236                status.addProperty("ram", "0");
237                status.addProperty("cpus", 0);
238            }
239            return status;
240        });
241
242        // Maybe stop VM
243        if (event.state() == State.TERMINATING && !event.failed()
244            && guestShutdownStops && shutdownByGuest) {
245            logger.info(() -> "Stopping VM because of shutdown by guest.");
246            PatchOptions patchOpts = new PatchOptions();
247            patchOpts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
248            var res = vmStub.patch(V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_PATCH,
249                new V1Patch("[{\"op\": \"replace\", \"path\": \"/spec/vm/state"
250                    + "\", \"value\": \"Stopped\"}]"),
251                patchOpts);
252            if (!res.isSuccess()) {
253                logger.warning(
254                    () -> "Cannot patch pod annotations: " + res.getStatus());
255            }
256        }
257
258        // Log event
259        var evt = new EventsV1Event()
260            .reportingController(VM_OP_GROUP + "/" + APP_NAME)
261            .action("StatusUpdate").reason(event.reason())
262            .note(event.message());
263        K8s.createEvent(apiClient, vmState, evt);
264    }
265
266    private void updateRunningCondition(RunnerStateChange event,
267            K8sDynamicModel from, JsonObject cond) {
268        boolean reportedRunning
269            = "True".equals(cond.get("status").getAsString());
270        if (RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
271            && !reportedRunning) {
272            cond.addProperty("status", "True");
273            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
274                Instant.now().toString());
275        }
276        if (!RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
277            && reportedRunning) {
278            cond.addProperty("status", "False");
279            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
280                Instant.now().toString());
281        }
282        cond.addProperty("reason", event.reason());
283        cond.addProperty("message", event.message());
284        cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
285            from.getMetadata().getGeneration());
286    }
287
288    /**
289     * On ballon change.
290     *
291     * @param event the event
292     * @throws ApiException 
293     */
294    @Handler
295    public void onBallonChange(BalloonChangeEvent event) throws ApiException {
296        if (vmStub == null) {
297            return;
298        }
299        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
300            JsonObject status = K8s.status(from);
301            status.addProperty("ram",
302                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.size()), Format.BINARY_SI)
303                    .toSuffixedString());
304            return status;
305        });
306    }
307
308    /**
309     * On ballon change.
310     *
311     * @param event the event
312     * @throws ApiException 
313     */
314    @Handler
315    public void onCpuChange(HotpluggableCpuStatus event) throws ApiException {
316        if (vmStub == null) {
317            return;
318        }
319        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
320            JsonObject status = K8s.status(from);
321            status.addProperty("cpus", event.usedCpus().size());
322            return status;
323        });
324    }
325
326    /**
327     * On shutdown.
328     *
329     * @param event the event
330     * @throws ApiException the api exception
331     */
332    @Handler
333    public void onShutdown(ShutdownEvent event) throws ApiException {
334        shutdownByGuest = event.byGuest();
335    }
336}
